description: Try our easy to follow Pluto Pups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pluto Pups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a frying pan on medium and cook beef sausage (see note) for 15 minutes, turning until cooked through. Set aside.

Meanwhile, combine self-raising flour and pinch of salt in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre. Add lightly whisked egg and gradually whisk in 375ml beer until a smooth batter forms. Insert a bamboo skewer into each sausage lengthways.
Place plain flour onto a plate and roll sausages in flour to coat.
Fill a saucepan with vegetable oil until 5cm deep and heat on high. Dip each sausage into batter. Lower into oil and cook for 2 minutes until golden and crisp.

Transfer to a plate lined with paper towel. Repeat with remaining sausage. Serve. Note: You can use continental frankfurts or cocktail franks instead. No need to pre-cook, just coat in batter and cook.
